page.title: 08Sandford House
page.content:
Sandford House was built in 1858. It was built by{Mr Miles.}Sandford House is a big house. It look's like a church from the front of the house.
There were stables for horses, which were used to pull a carriage. The attic was used for the maids' bedrooms. There were eight bedrooms in the main house.
There were lots of wild rabbits which got in the garden and dug up the grass which made a mess. Sandford House is tall and there are many trees around it. The family went swimming in{ {Sherford river}but they had to learn to swim before they went. During World War Two, the family moved out of the house, and it was used by the army.
